```{r}
a = c(1,3,2,2,3,1,2,3)
a = sort(a)
sum = 0
current_word = ""
for(i in 1:length(a)){
  if (a[i] != current_word){   
    print("current_word");
    print(current_word);
    print("sum");
    print(sum);
    current_word = a[i];
    sum = 1;
  }else{
    sum = sum + 1;
  }
}
print("current_word");
print(current_word);
print("sum");
print(sum);
```
